name: FRUBASE
description:
This is the page for the FRUBASE database, a huge dataset of fleshy fruit traits compiled from bibliographic references and my own work. 

Data are provided for more than 1000 plant species from all around the world. It contains a copy of the main data file used for this paper, as well as other accompanying files (see below).

Taxonomic arrangement follows:

Nomenclature and taxonomic arrangement follows Stevens, P. F. (2001 onwards). Angiosperm Phylogeny Website. Version 8, June 2007. http://www.mobot.org/MOBOT/research/APweb/. 

This scheme follows: A.P.G. [= Angiosperm Phylogeny Group] II. 2003. An update of the Angiosperm Phylogeny Group classification for the orders and families of flowering plants: APG II. Bot. J. Linnean Soc. 141: 399-436.

Plant names and names of higher taxonomic categories have been checked with: Mabberley, D.J. 1987. The plant-book. A portable dictionary of the higher plants. Cambridge University Press, Cambridge, UK.
funder: Ministerio de Ciencia e Innovaci√≥n, Spain

variableMeasured.name: cl
variableMeasured.description: Class

variableMeasured.name: scl
variableMeasured.description: Subclass

variableMeasured.name: ord
variableMeasured.description: Order

variableMeasured.name: fam
variableMeasured.description: Family

variableMeasured.name: gen
variableMeasured.description: Genus

variableMeasured.name: sp
variableMeasured.description: Species

variableMeasured.name: ref
variableMeasured.description: Reference number - This is my maintenance code for updates.

variableMeasured.name: newref
variableMeasured.description: New Reference number - These are the refs numbers in the files REFS and SUMMARY.

variableMeasured.name: famlab
variableMeasured.description: Family Label -  An 8-character label for family.

variableMeasured.name: genlab
variableMeasured.description: Genus Label -   An 8-character label for genus.

variableMeasured.name: splab
variableMeasured.description: Species Label - An 8-character label for species.

variableMeasured.name: cod
variableMeasured.description: Species code -  A 5-character code for the species.

variableMeasured.name: dispcat
variableMeasured.description: Disperser type category - BIRDS, MIXED, MAMMALS.

variableMeasured.name: disp
variableMeasured.description: Disperser type - Finer categorization. Not yet completed. Needs revision.

variableMeasured.name: area
variableMeasured.description: Geographic area - Major geographic areas of the data sources. MEurope: Mediterranean Europe (also includes Israel and Morocco. NEurope: Temperate and Northern Europe. NAmerica: North America, excl. Southern Mexico. NTAmerica: Neotropical America, incl. Southern Mexico. Africa: Africa, south of Sahara. Australasia: Australia, Malaysia, New Guinea, and whole SouthEast Asia.

variableMeasured.name: fruit
variableMeasured.description: Fruit type - Type of fruit. Not completed yet.

variableMeasured.name: leng
variableMeasured.description: Fruit length

variableMeasured.name: diam
variableMeasured.description: Fruit diamter

variableMeasured.name: frfm
variableMeasured.description: Fruit fresh mass

variableMeasured.name: pdm
variableMeasured.description: Pulp dry mass

variableMeasured.name: sdm
variableMeasured.description: Seed dry mass

variableMeasured.name: seeds
variableMeasured.description: Number of seeds

variableMeasured.name: seedm
variableMeasured.description: Individual seed mass

variableMeasured.name: ry
variableMeasured.description: Relative yield of pulp: dry mass of pulp/whole fruit fresh mass

variableMeasured.name: kjg
variableMeasured.description: Specific energy content of pulp (kJ/g)

variableMeasured.name: kjfr
variableMeasured.description: Total energy content per fruit (kJ)

variableMeasured.name: pcw
variableMeasured.description: Percent water of the fruit

variableMeasured.name: lip
variableMeasured.description: Proportion of lipids (per g dry pulp)

variableMeasured.name: pro
variableMeasured.description: Proportion of protein (per g dry pulp)

variableMeasured.name: nsc
variableMeasured.description: Proportion of non-structural carbohydrates (per g dry pulp)

variableMeasured.name: ash
variableMeasured.description: Proportion of ash (per g dry pulp)

variableMeasured.name: fib
variableMeasured.description: Proportion of fiber (per g dry pulp)
